definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
Mt Babao Revolutionary Cemetery in Haidian district of Beijing
pinyin: Ba1 bao3 Shan1 Ge2 ming4 Gong1 mu4

definition: Chidori ga fuchi, national war cemetery in Tokyo/also called Tomb of the Unknown Soldier
pinyin: Qian1 niao3 yuan1 guo2 jia1 gong1 mu4

definition: Arlington National Cemetery in Washington DC, USA
pinyin: A1 ling2 dun4 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 mu4

sentences.english: His ashes lie in the same Roman cemetery where Keats is buried.
sentences.chinese: 他的骨灰安放在羅馬公墓，濟慈也安葬於此。

sentences.english: His remains were shipped back and laid away in a cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 他的遺體被運回，埋葬在一個公墓裏。

sentences.english: I did a book report on Pet Sematary in 8th grade.
sentences.chinese: 8年級時，我做了《寵物公墓》的讀書報告。

sentences.english: Women walk at the Sakhi cemetery in Kabul on March 16.
sentences.chinese: 婦女走在喀布爾的薩基在3月16日公墓。

sentences.english: Tracy: There will a farewell ceremony tomorrow at the Babaoshan Revolutionary Cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 明天會在八寶山革命公墓舉行告別儀式。

sentences.english: A decomposed corpse was found this morning at Arlington National Cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 早上在阿林頓國家公墓發現了一具腐爛的屍體。

sentences.english: He would never ravage flowers, certainly not in a cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 而他從不會毀壞花草，當然也不會是在公墓裏。

sentences.english: Islanders buried the man in the island’s Old European Cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 島民把它埋在過去歐洲人的公墓。

sentences.english: There will a farewell ceremony tomorrow at the Babaoshan Revolutionary Cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 明天會在八寶山革命公墓舉行告別儀式。

sentences.english: He will be buried in the suburb of Los Angeles at Glendale Forest-Lawn memorial park.
sentences.chinese: 傑克遜將被葬在洛杉磯郊外“森林草坪”公墓。

sentences.english: Local Muslims said they would not let them be buried in city cemeteries.
sentences.chinese: 當地的穆斯林說他們不會讓這些屍體埋到市公墓裏去。

sentences.english: She is buried in 4)plot 869 of a cemetery in Carbon County, Pennsylvania.
sentences.chinese: 她被埋在賓州卡本郡一處公墓的第869號墓地。

sentences.english: His is buried in Green River Cemetery and a large boulder marks the spot.
sentences.chinese: 他被葬於綠河公墓中，用一塊大圓石作爲他的墓碑。

sentences.english: And in this national cemetery , it is another day when grief remains fresh.
sentences.chinese: 在這個國家公墓裏，它將會哀思仍記憶猶新的一天。

sentences.english: Even today I went to the cemetery with Toldo.
sentences.chinese: 今天我還和托爾多一起去了公墓。

sentences.english: Obama will give a speech at the American cemetery in Colleville-sur-Mer.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬將在濱海科爾維爾美國公墓發表講話。

definition: to sweep a grave (and pay one's respects to the dead person)
hill cemetery/graveyard/grave/grave mound/low wall at the back of a traditional tomb
grave/tomb/graveyard/cemetery/fig. one's native place (where one's ancestors are buried)
Mt Babao Revolutionary Cemetery in Haidian district of Beijing
pinyin: Ba1 bao3 Shan1 Ge2 ming4 Gong1 mu4
